website_summaries.verdict: Acer's 13.3-inch Swift 3 brings a few wins to the ultraportable arena, chief among them a moderate $899.99 price. Even with a so-so screen and some keyboard stumbles, it's worth a look.
pros: Good performance (except for graphics) and battery life
cons: Keyboard layout is clumsy in spots
Pin or bent paper clip required to access microSD slot

customer_reviews.title: It's a sc! Nobody checked laptop
customer_reviews.text: Laptop arrived bent, with a hole on back! Crazy! Nobody checked before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality laptop, we are very happy with this one!
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a month now and its a workhorse and light as a feather. Excellent price to performance! It gets used for basic web surfing and word processing and we notice no heat or noise. We are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: UcMike

customer_reviews.title: Catch 22
customer_reviews.text: While attempting to update and activate Norton Anti Virus, it said it couldn't update as the OS needed updating first. Went to update OS, and a message said it couldn't update, because it needed to update, in order to update. HUH? Catch 22. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great laptop at a great price. Its well built, its fast enough for normal use and its significantly less expensive than other ultrabooks. The keyboard is really nice to type on, the screen is bright and crisp. It even supports USB-C charging so i have one less brick to carry around. If you are looking for a very portable laptop and a good price, I definitely recommend the Ace Swift 3.
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: Why didnt AMAZON email me delivery survey??
customer_reviews.text: 1. AMAZON Delivery Problem: Seal broken on box exterior & seal broken inside box to access computer. 2. PROS: Lightweight, SUPER FAST boot up/shut down, great pic quality 3.CON: keyboard missing "home" "end" keys 4. CON: arrow keys tiny solution - i attached $15 full size keyboard . 5. CON: does not come with Word, Excel, etc. but find a friend working for school/univ or a government to buy set for $20 for you?
customer_reviews.author: I hate fraudulent companies

customer_reviews.title: Great size, lightweight very poor speaker and keyboard
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months the speaker stopped working except intermitently and when it does it is totally garbled and full of static and crackling. The keyboard works fine until it stops completely and I have to restart the computer. This happens every few days. Really ridiculous for a brand new machine. And of course it's not possible to return it now.
customer_reviews.author: Mela

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine.
customer_reviews.text: Fast. Powerful. Sleek. The keys feel good. The backlit keyboard is awesome. Screen looks great. This bezel is easy on the wrists.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: It is a lightweight and fast laptop, it is flying compared to my older Acer Celeron Laptop. The fan is extremely quiet. As for the Keyboard and the overall design it looks like Mac.
customer_reviews.author: Mykhaylo

customer_reviews.title: Great computer at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer. Compact and powerful. The speakers aren’t great but I use an external speaker anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Levkoff

customer_reviews.title: Dent on top of Laptop.  Where's the QA?
customer_reviews.text: I had seen someones review of this product stating that her laptop came with a dent and a hole. I figured it was just a fluke. However, mine has arrived with a dent on the top. Doesn't Acer perform any QA on their laptops? I hope it works better than it looks! Unless I get $100 credit, I will be returning it!
customer_reviews.author: Nutch

customer_reviews.title: Sleek looking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop for my son's Jr. High promotion. He was very happy to receive this sleek looking laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Dina A.

customer_reviews.title: Password issue
customer_reviews.text: Need help with password issue no help keep sending me to Microsoft ....
customer_reviews.author: karen d

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied with computer and the retailer "Brown Box"
customer_reviews.text: Great little laptop for the price. Was very happy with the price point, delivery, and customer service by "Brown Box" retailer
customer_reviews.author: Dan D

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son for college and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Negron

customer_reviews.title: Very nice machine
customer_reviews.text: We are happy so far with his computer. It's very light, the screen is like a crystal and it is lightning fast thanks to the SSD
customer_reviews.author: Lee   St Clair

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: DRIVER FOR NETWORK DRIVER STOPPED WORKING AFTE ONLY 8 MONTHS
customer_reviews.author: Carmel

product_meta.title: Acer Swift 3 SF314-55-55UT Laptop, 14" Full HD, 8th Gen Intel Core i5-8265U, 8GB DDR4, 256GB PCIe SSD, Gigabit WiFi, Back-Lit Keyboard, Windows 10
product_meta.description: Acer Swift 3 SF314-55-55UT comes with these high level specs: 8th Generation Intel Core i5-8265U Processor 1. 6 gramHz with Turbo Boost Technology up to 3. 9 gramHz (6MB Smart cache), Windows 10 Home, 14. 0" Full HD (1920 x 1080) widescreen LED-backlit IPS display, Intel UHD Graphics 620, 8 GB DDR4 Dual Channel Memory, 256 GB Pie SSD, Secure Digital (SD), Acer True Harmony Technology, Two Built-in Stereo Speakers, Acer Purified. Voice technology with two built-in microphones, Intel Wireless-AC 9560 802. 11ac Gigabit Wi-Fi which can deliver up to 1. 73 GBps throughput when using 160Mhz channels (Dual-Band 2. 4 gramHz & 5 gramHz), Bluetooth 5. 0, Back-lit Keyboard, Acer Bio-Protection Fingerprint Solution, featuring Computer Protection and Windows Hello Certification, HD Webcam (1280 x 720) supporting Super High Dynamic Range (SHDR), 1 - USB Type-C ports USB 3. 1 Gen 2 (up to 10 Gbps) DisplayPort over USB Type-C & USB Charging, 2 - USB 3. 0 port (one featuring power-off charging), 1 - HDMI out with HDCP support, 4-cell Li-Ion Battery (3220 mAh), Up to 12-hours Battery Life, 2. 98 lbs. | 1. 35 kg (system unit only) (NX. H3WAA. 001)
feature_bullets: 8th Generation Intel Core i5-8265u Processor (Upto 3. 9 gramHz), 8 GB onboard DDR4 Dual Channel Memory & 256 GB Pie SSD
14" Full HD (1920 x 1080) IPS widescreen LED-backlit Display
Back-lit keyboard, Intel Wireless-AC 9560 802. 11AC Gigabit Wi-Fi & Bluetooth 5. 0
1 - USB Type-C ports USB 3. 1 Gen 2 (upto 10 Gaps) DisplayPort over USB Type-C & USB charging, 2 - USB 3. 0 port (one featuring power-off charging) & 1 - HDMI Port
Windows 10 Home & 4-cell Li-Ion (3220 mAh) battery, Upto 12 hours Battery Life
